default.description: Default brand color. Use it for UI elements that are related to the learners success like buttons in trainers, progress bars, idicators or motivating text.

hover.description: Hover state of the default brand color. Only us in interactive elements that provide a hover state.

active.description: Active state of the default brand color. Only us in interactive elements that provide an active state.

on-default.description: Use brand.on-default if you need a foreground color on brand.default filled surfaces. E.g., buttons in trainers.

surface-1.description: Indicate surfaces in context with learners success.

surface-2.description: Indicate surfaces in context with learners success.

surface-3.description: Indicate surfaces in context with learners success.

on-surface-1.description: Use as forground color in the context of learners success.

on-surface-2.description: Use as forground color in the context of learners success.

on-surface-3.description: Use as forground color in the context of learners success.
